subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Mel Tucker, Cleveland’s defensive backs coach the past three seasons, is the club’s new defensive coordinator. He will replace Todd Grantham, who was fired Friday. Cleveland’s defense was one of the N.F.L.’s poorest in 2007. ESPN.com.
